item.title: I Need Help With Perfect Pickup 100%
item.dc:creator: @SkilledNinjaJoey SkilledNinjaJoey
item.description:
@SkilledNinjaJoey wrote:

Hi, i’ve been using some guides for the 100% perfect pickup, and for somereason it’s giving me errors how ever i put it, and its really annoying so if you really could, ill put in the client.java i use and could you try change it for me? my msn is joezombie100@hotmail.com. Thanks,

On one part of the guide it tells me to Declare this…
And i dont know how to declare. I think it’s the only part which is giving me errors.

[code]public int apickupid = -1;
public int apickupx = -1;
public int apickupy = -1;

public void scanPickup()
{
if (absX == apickupx && absY == apickupy)
{
if (ItemHandler.itemExists(apickupid, absX, absY))
{
int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy);
if (addItem(apickupid, itemAmount))
{//only removes the item when has enough space!
ItemHandler.removeItem(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy, itemAmount);
removeGroundItem(apickupx, apickupy, apickupid);
apickupid = -1;
apickupx = -1;
apickupy = -1;
}
}
else if (hasntLoggedin){
sendMessage(“Too late, its gone!”);
apickupid = -1;
apickupx = -1;
apickupy = -1;
}
}
}
public boolean hasntLoggedin = false;[/code]

Thanks for reading this topic and it will be a great help if you can help me

[size=14pt]HERES THE LINK TO MY CLIENT.JAVA!!![/size]

http://uppit.com/BUCHHY

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help With Perfect Pickup 100%
